name: Pub Boy
description:
PUB BOY

You were just a regular guy, untill your grandpa turns you into a something looks like elephant(?).

You are an experimental thing. If you pass levels successfully your grandpa will solve the MultiVerses!

How To Play

Main goal of the game is complete all levels. You can pass levels by dying. When you die your corpse will stay where you die.

I suggest you to play with a gamepad.

Controls are basic;

A-D , Left-Right Arrow or Left Joystick - MOVE

Space or X on Gamepad - JUMP

Left Shift or RB on Gamepad - RUN

R to Restart Level

ESC return to main menu
